About

This is a blog written by Robert Cudmore.

It is a place where I put things so I have access to them from anywhere I have an internet connection.

This blog is written in redcarpet markdown using Jekyll and is hosted on my Github site.

I started this blog on February 7, 2015 to replace my previous WordPress blog.

v0.1
